Tolkien-related events that took place in 1945.

content.title: January
content.content:
7 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 94a.
9 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 94b.
15 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 94c.
18 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 95.
21 - Martin Shaw is born.
30 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 96.
? - Leaf by Niggle is published in the The Dublin Review.

content.title: February
content.content:
10 - J.R.R. Tolkien starts writing a letter to the Catholic Herald.
11 - J.R.R. Tolkien finishes writing a letter to the Catholic Herald.
11 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 97.
17 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 97a.
20 - Tolkien joins the Oxford Dante Society.[1]
23 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 97b.
23 - A letter by J.R.R. Tolkien, "The Name Coventry", is published in the Catholic Herald.

content.title: March
content.content:
12 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 97c.
18? - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 98.
? - Christopher Tolkien returns to England after serving in South Africa.[2]

content.title: April
content.content:
18 - Karen Wynn Fonstad, amateur cartographer, is born.
29 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 98a.

content.title: May
content.content:
15 - Charles Williams, Inkling, dies.
15 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 99.
29 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 100.

content.title: June
content.content:
2 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Maegraith.
3 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 101.
23 - J.R.R. Tolkien is elected Merton Professor of English Language and Literature.

content.title: August
content.content:
9 - As the bombs are dropped on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, Tolkien denounces these tactics as "utter folly".
18 - Eric Rücker Eddison dies.

content.title: September
content.content: 17 - Bruce Spence, who would play the Mouth of Sauron in the extended edition of The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King, is born.

content.title: October
content.content:
? - J.R.R. Tolkien is made a Fellow of Merton College.[3]
7 - Author Hal Colebatch is born.
9 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 102a.
11 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 103.
22 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 104.
26 - Author Jane Chance is born.

content.title: December
content.content:
2 - J.R.R. Tolkien submits The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth Beorhthelm's Son for publication.
? - The Lay of Aotrou and Itroun is published in the Welsh Review.

? - Tolkien states he is putting The Lord of the Rings "before all else".
? - Writer Jim Allan is born.
? - Actor Jeffrey Thomas is born.
